title: European Central Bank (ECB) API Wrapper
text: goal ecbr provide simple interface ECB API. main difference packages ’s modern implementation using httr2 package.

title: European Central Bank (ECB) API Wrapper
text: can install development version ecbr GitHub :

title: European Central Bank (ECB) API Wrapper
code: library(ecbr)  # fetch US dollar/Euro exchange rate fx_rate <- ecb_data("EXR", "D.USD.EUR.SP00.A", start_period = "2021-01-01") fx_rate #> # A tibble: 793 × 6 #>   date       title          description                    unit  frequency value #>   <date>     <chr>          <chr>                          <chr> <chr>     <dbl> #> 1 2021-01-04 US dollar/Euro ECB reference exchange rate, … USD   daily      1.23 #> 2 2021-01-05 US dollar/Euro ECB reference exchange rate, … USD   daily      1.23 #> 3 2021-01-06 US dollar/Euro ECB reference exchange rate, … USD   daily      1.23 #> 4 2021-01-07 US dollar/Euro ECB reference exchange rate, … USD   daily      1.23 #> 5 2021-01-08 US dollar/Euro ECB reference exchange rate, … USD   daily      1.23 #> # ℹ 788 more rows  library(ggplot2)  title <- fx_rate[1, "title", drop = TRUE] subtitle <- fx_rate[1, "description", drop = TRUE]  ggplot(fx_rate, aes(x = date, y = value)) +   geom_line() +   labs(x = NULL, y = NULL, title = title, subtitle = subtitle) +   theme_minimal()

title: European Central Bank (ECB) API Wrapper
text: ecb: R interface European Central Bank’s Statistical Data Warehouse (SDW) API

title: Returns available code lists — ecb_codelist
text: Returns available code lists

title: Returns available code lists — ecb_codelist
text: agency character(1) agency query. Defaut NULL. id character(1) id query. Default NULL.

title: Returns available code lists — ecb_codelist
text: data.frame available code lists. columns : id id code list name name code list

title: Returns available code lists — ecb_codelist
text: https://data.ecb.europa.eu/help/api/metadata

title: Returns available code lists — ecb_codelist
code: ecb_codelist() #> # A tibble: 145,619 × 3 #>    agency id             name                                                    #>    <chr>  <chr>          <chr>                                                   #>  1 ECB    CLI_EONIA_BANK EONIA code list for banks                               #>  2 ECB    CLI_EONIA_BANK EONIA Total/aggregate                                   #>  3 ECB    CLI_EONIA_ITEM EONIA item code list                                    #>  4 ECB    CLI_EONIA_ITEM Weighted average rate                                   #>  5 ECB    CLI_EONIA_ITEM Volume                                                  #>  6 ECB    CLI_LM_ITEM    Liquidity manag. balance sheet item code list           #>  7 ECB    CLI_LM_ITEM    Gold and gold receivables                               #>  8 ECB    CLI_LM_ITEM    Claims on non-euro area residents denominated in forei… #>  9 ECB    CLI_LM_ITEM    Receivables from the IMF                                #> 10 ECB    CLI_LM_ITEM    Balances with banks and security investments, external… #> # ℹ 145,609 more rows # or filter by id ecb_codelist(id = "CLI_EONIA_BANK") #> # A tibble: 2 × 3 #>   agency id             name                      #>   <chr>  <chr>          <chr>                     #> 1 ECB    CLI_EONIA_BANK EONIA code list for banks #> 2 ECB    CLI_EONIA_BANK EONIA Total/aggregate

what: Returns data for a given flow and key — ecb_data
title: Returns data for a given flow and key — ecb_data
text: Returns data given flow key

title: Returns data for a given flow and key — ecb_data
code: ecb_data(   flow,   key = NULL,   start_period = NULL,   end_period = NULL,   first_n = NULL,   last_n = NULL )

title: Returns data for a given flow and key — ecb_data
text: flow character(1) flow query. key character(1) key query. start_period character(1) start date data. Supported formats: YYYY annual data (e.g., "2019") YYYY-S[1-2] semi-annual data (e.g., "2019-S1") YYYY-Q[1-4] quarterly data (e.g., "2019-Q1") YYYY-MM monthly data (e.g., "2019-01") YYYY-W[01-53] weekly data (e.g., "2019-W01") YYYY-MM-DD daily business data (e.g., "2019-01-01") NULL, start date restriction applied (data retrieved earliest available date). Default NULL. end_period character(1) end date data, format start_period. NULL, end date restriction applied (data retrieved recent available date). Default NULL. first_n numeric(1) number observations retrieve start series. NULL, restriction applied. Default NULL. last_n numeric(1) number observations retrieve end series. NULL, restriction applied. Default NULL.

title: Returns data for a given flow and key — ecb_data
text: https://data.ecb.europa.eu/help/api/data

title: Returns data for a given flow and key — ecb_data
code: # fetch US dollar/Euro exchange rate ecb_data("EXR", "D.USD.EUR.SP00.A") #> # A tibble: 6,537 × 6 #>    date       title          description                   unit  frequency value #>    <date>     <chr>          <chr>                         <chr> <chr>     <dbl> #>  1 1999-01-04 US dollar/Euro ECB reference exchange rate,… USD   daily      1.18 #>  2 1999-01-05 US dollar/Euro ECB reference exchange rate,… USD   daily      1.18 #>  3 1999-01-06 US dollar/Euro ECB reference exchange rate,… USD   daily      1.17 #>  4 1999-01-07 US dollar/Euro ECB reference exchange rate,… USD   daily      1.16 #>  5 1999-01-08 US dollar/Euro ECB reference exchange rate,… USD   daily      1.17 #>  6 1999-01-11 US dollar/Euro ECB reference exchange rate,… USD   daily      1.16 #>  7 1999-01-12 US dollar/Euro ECB reference exchange rate,… USD   daily      1.15 #>  8 1999-01-13 US dollar/Euro ECB reference exchange rate,… USD   daily      1.17 #>  9 1999-01-14 US dollar/Euro ECB reference exchange rate,… USD   daily      1.17 #> 10 1999-01-15 US dollar/Euro ECB reference exchange rate,… USD   daily      1.16 #> # ℹ 6,527 more rows

title: Returns available data structures — ecb_data_structure
text: Returns available data structures

title: Returns available data structures — ecb_data_structure
text: agency character(1) agency query. Defaut NULL. id character(1) id query. Default NULL.

title: Returns available data structures — ecb_data_structure
text: data.frame() available data structures. columns : id id data structure name name data structure

title: Returns available data structures — ecb_data_structure
text: https://data.ecb.europa.eu/help/api/metadata

title: Returns available data structures — ecb_data_structure
code: ecb_data_structure() #> # A tibble: 84 × 3 #>    agency id          name                                                      #>    <chr>  <chr>       <chr>                                                     #>  1 ECB    ECB_AME1    AMECO                                                     #>  2 ECB    ECB_BCS1    Business Cycle Statistics                                 #>  3 ECB    ECB_BKN1    Banknotes Statistics                                      #>  4 ECB    ECB_BLS1    Bank Lending Survey Statistics                            #>  5 ECB    ECB_BOP1    Balance of Payments, I.I.P. and Reserve Assets Statistics #>  6 ECB    ECB_BOP_BNT Statistics on Shipments of Euro Banknotes                 #>  7 ECB    ECB_BSI1    Balance Sheet Items                                       #>  8 ECB    ECB_CAR1    Car Statistics                                            #>  9 ECB    ECB_CBD1    Statistics on Consolidated Banking Data                   #> 10 ECB    ECB_CBD2    Statistics on Consolidated Banking Data                   #> # ℹ 74 more rows # or filter by id ecb_data_structure(id = "ECB_BCS1") #> # A tibble: 1 × 3 #>   agency id       name                      #>   <chr>  <chr>    <chr>                     #> 1 ECB    ECB_BCS1 Business Cycle Statistics
